description: Just snap, style, and sell. That’s how remarkably easy the Square Photo Studio app is. Snap an ecommerce photo. Style your photo and remove the background. Sell your items instantly with Square. Plus, it’s free.

title: Hal9
blurb: Bring your data to life
description: Compose web-ready data transformations, visualizations, and predictions with the ease of drag-and-drop, powerful extensions, and a vibrant community.

title: Upstream Collectives
blurb: DAO in a box
description: An Upstream Collective is a virtual community with a shared wallet. Members contribute money to the Collective & vote on how to use the funds. We took all the features needed to run a DAO & brought it into one place. An Upstream Collective is a DAO, evolved.

title: Notchtastic
blurb: A camera notch for every Mac
description: Whether you're a designer or a Mac enthusiast, Notchtastic helps you experience a Mac camera notch on your current device today! Notchtastic renders a realistic camera notch at the top of your screen, simulating the notches released in the 2021 MacBook Pros.

title: Multiple Calendars Selector for Google
blurb: Allows quickly displaying just the set of calendars you want
description: With this Google Calendar extension for Chrome, you'll define presets of multiple calendars that can be displayed or hidden with one click. You will be able to switch between them easily. Useful for viewing a team's or several conference rooms' availability.

title: Air Native by Zeroqode
blurb: Convert your Bubble web app into Android & iOS
description: Air Native solution from Zeroqode allows wrapping web apps built with bubble.io into native apps for Apple App Store and Google Play. Supports native push notifications, In-app purchases, Touch ID, GPS and many more.

title: Parti by The Creator Project
blurb: Offer NFT-based memberships and benefits in one place
description: Create a full-branded, NFT-based membership site for your top fans, offering exclusive content and benefits.

title: The Sales Email Deliverability Guide
blurb: Your ultimate guide to get your emails delivered at scale
description: An in-depth guide to understanding email deliverability and how to improve it. Used by hundreds of sales teams to maintain a healthy reputation while doing sales at scale.

title: Patchwork
blurb: Share where it matters
description: Patchwork is the fastest way to share what you're reading online. Highlight text, click on Patchwork, and share without leaving the page.

title: Grapevine
blurb: Chat and work together in a 3D virtual world
description: Grapevine allows you to chat, collaborate and work in a 3D virtual space. With spatial audio, beautiful customizable 3D worlds, and loads of collaborative tools, Grapevine creates a feeling of togetherness and presence in your team. Join us in the metaverse!

title: Epoch Equity
blurb: Simplified exits for founders
description: We take the headaches out  of selling a business. When selling your business, you have to deal with attorneys, accountants, bankers, brokers, appraisers, and the list goes on. Take a breath, relax and let us do the hard work.

title: Alertphant
blurb: Get notifications when something unusual happens to your ads
description: Losing sleep over campaign results, and missing important signals? Try AlertPhant! It's a chatbot that sends you regular notifications about your digital campaign performance, reports anomalies, and much more!

title: Birdfy
blurb: Auto AI recognition bird feeder camera
description: Recognize 6,000+ bird species and never miss a moment. Save unique behaviors automatically, giving you time to cherish new experiences.

title: HIPAA compliant analytics by Freshpaint
blurb: The only HIPAA-compliant analytics & Customer Data Platform
description: Freshpaint is the only HIPAA-compliant customer data platform: unify customer data, control PHI, & integrate 200+ tools. ID Masking & Enforced Allowlists enable healthcare companies to use tools like Mixpanel or Amplitude without paying extra for a BAA.

title: Excalideck
blurb: Weapon for Legendary Slides
description: An app for authoring slide decks that look hand-drawn.

title: Vissles LP85
blurb: Ultra-thin 75% optical-mechanical keyboard
description: Vissles LP85 is a 75% ultra-slim optical-mechanical keyboard crafted for speed, precision, and comfort. The LP85 strives a perfect balance between a conventional and a mechanical keyboard,

title: SitYEA
blurb: Posture tracking software
description: SitYEA is a Windows application, which helps to remain healthy while working on the computer. 💻 Keep correct posture during the day! 🤩 And avoid back pain!

title: Gamebytes
blurb: Games for iMessage
description: Play games directly in iMessage and make new friends to play with. Gamebytes brings a fresh collection of games to iMessage along with a dedicated chat app to be the home for all your chat games.

title: Firstparty
blurb: Customer analytics for marketers and developers
description: You should own all of your web analytics data, and we're here to help. Developer tools to collect events and build marketing automations. https://twitter.com/kressaty/status/1428099448836612097

title: Security Camera Lens Calculator
blurb: Find optimal cameras + their locations to protect your home
description: Unique security camera lens calculator with 3D graphics(WebGL) and a camera database. Calculate Field of View, lens focal length, pixels on target. Load a floor map to see camera coverage. Check DORI zones by IEC/EN standard 62676. Your blurry footage said TRY

title: Prodigee
blurb: Talent referral marketplace that democratizes recruitment
description: Prodigee is a talent referral marketplace with the goal of democratizing recruitment. Companies post jobs on the platform for free and set a referral bonus amount which is only paid on successful hire of a candidate.

title: FlowFrames
blurb: No-code web pages for events, link groups, lists & forms
description: Whether you need to build a linktree type of page, an FAQ, an events minisite or a simple form, FlowFrames can help you do so. And you won't have to write a single line of code. Embed them on your website, community app or share them on your social profiles.

title: InspectContent
blurb: Inspect content of any URL
description: Specify a page URL, get words and letters count, find keywords and keyword count. See the average reading time of the page text.

title: Shortery
blurb: The missing automation tool for macOS Shortcuts
description: Shortery adds the missing automation tools to macOS Monterey. With Shortery you can run Shortcuts automatically, that you've created in the Shortcuts app using different triggers: App Launch / Quit, Time, Wake Up & Sleep, Login, Keyboard, Appearance, Power

title: SendLetter
blurb: Send letters online
description: Send Documents, Invoices, Letters physically to anywhere in the world Have Documents Printed, Folded and Mailed by us, starting at $1

title: Soft UI Dashboard Builder
blurb: Simple low code dashboard builder
description: Soft UI Dashboard Builder - Create dashboard pages for your Startup or Business in minutes using our Simple Low Code Dashboard Builder based on Bootstrap 🎉 ⓵ Choose blocks ⓶ Edit code and texts ⓷ Download Source Code Perfect for coders and nocoders!

title: ICON
blurb: The ultimate mobile fashion adventure and creation game.
description: Create fashion lines; sell them as digital goods using our powerful in-app style creator. Link them to NFTs. Explore the latest fashion trends; post them to your feed using your 3D avatar. Forge a new identity, discover new friends. Become a fashion ICON!

title: reacty
blurb: User feedback, but simple and private.
description: reacty makes collecting user feedback for your website easy and privacy-friendly. It doesn't store cookies, nor the data of your users. All you need to add it to your page is one line of code. You don't even need to know how to code!

title: Equinox
blurb: Create dynamic wallpapers for macOS
description: Equinox is an app for creating macOS dynamic wallpapers. Starting macOS Mojave we have such cool things as «Dynamic Desktop», «Light and Dark Desktop» types of wallpapers. With the help of the Equinox app, you can easily create those with a few clicks.

title: Spark
blurb: Helping socially anxious people grow and develop
description: We made a small app in collaboration with a psychologist which will serve as a safe haven for people with severe social anxiety, here they can discuss their issues among themselves without stigma or judgement. Heavily curated and moderated.

title: Shufflepop
blurb: Video walkthroughs of top apps for design/product reference
description: Designing/building a product? Researching how the top teams do it is a surefire way to make sure your work is world-class. Problem is, that can take a lot of time/money! We're building a library of product walkthroughs that anyone can use for fast research.

title: QRya
blurb: Free digital QR menu for your business
description: Create your free account, load your product with images prices and catgories, and get a QR code for your costumers to see your products.

title: Sticky Studio
blurb: A collaborative whiteboard for complex discussions
description: Sticky Studio is a collaborative whiteboard that helps people make sense of messy topics together. See the big picture by emphasizing how stickies are connected and go deeper with discussion threads on each sticky.

title: Holygym
blurb: Free guided workouts for home fitness.
description: Holygym is an app created to give people free option to work out at home. Plenty of workouts plus workout generator gives you endless possibilities. Simple and minimalistic design sets focus on exercises. Health integration ensures you will close your rings.

title: Email Monster
blurb: Mask your email address with unlimited forwarding addresses
description: Sign up with your real email and choose a USERNAME. Any email sent to anything (_____@USERNAME.eml.monster) will be forwarded to your real email address. Turn off any alias or sender or both.

title: Ofelia AI
blurb: Your introduction to NFTs
description: Understand NFTs. Make a data-based decision whether you want to get into it. Maximize your chances of being profitable from the start.

title: Mighty Networks 2.0
blurb: Livestream from a community you own
description: Create a community, livestream, build online courses, run events, and charge for access all in your very own Mighty Network.

title: Gravity The Studio
blurb: Virtual clothing for your social media photos or game avatar
description: We create fashion that only exists digitally. The customer can upload a photo of themselves on our platform. We tailor the item to fit their pose so that it really appears they're wearing it in the photo. Or we could wear your avatar in game or metaverse.

title: Firstory Podcast Dashboard
blurb: Your podcast data in less than a minute
description: Know your podcast in just one glance. Firstory Hosting’s new dashboard includes: - Benchmark your podcast vs others’ - FLink (In-house ‘Linktree’) Stats - Audience Listening Times - Audience Demographics - Top Episodes, & more!

title: Pulse
blurb: Share, discuss, and collaborate asynchronously
description: Pulse is a platform to help high-growing teams share, discuss, and collaborate asynchronously — no matter when or where they are .

title: Please Share
blurb: Brillaintly simple employee advovacy for Slack
description: Please Share is a content amplification and engagement app for Slack. The service provides an easy way for employees to share and engage with approved company content on social media channels like LinkedIn and Twitter.

title: Strike.market
blurb: Alternative data for every stock investor
description: Strike.market is a stock research website full of next-level stock analysis with fundamental & alternative data. We monitor data like website traffic, patents, Google Trends, Share of Search, mobile apps ranking, and much more.

title: SUPA 2.0
blurb: Professional video maker for social media and ad platforms
description: SUPA is a professional video maker for social media and ad platforms

title: UpSocial Network
blurb: Get paid for creating content on social media
description: “Upsocial” is a blockhchain backed decentralized social network where users get paid for content creation. Other features include, “ability for users/influencers to create tokens for their community”, “DEX to exchange tokens” and “NFT marketplace for creators”

title: ToastPunk
blurb: An inspiring NFT series consisting of 1,000 emotive toasts
description: Originating from a true life Sunday breakfast story, ToastPunk is a Roblox toast face inspired NFT series of only 1,000 NFTs with a metaverse food storage utility & crypto casino ICO token roadmap.

title: HumanVoice
blurb: Text to voiceover for content creators
description: HumanVoice is made for content creators who want the absolute best quality when it comes to text to human like speech. We think that your audience will love it. It also features a Safari Extension so you can listen to articles right from your Safari browser.

title: Motor Admin
blurb: Launch a no-code admin panel for your project in a minute
description: Motor Admin is an open-source, self-hosted, no-code admin panel to manage your data, perform custom actions, build reports and dashboards.

title: push it
blurb: Send custom push notifications to your friends.
description: Currently charting at no.1 in the app store, push it offers a basic follower/following model and lets users send out a push notification to everyone who subscribes to you on the app.

title: Linkwork
blurb: A free tool that enables collaborative & social web browsing
description: Linkwork is a free tool that enables collaborative web browsing by instant sharing of links between users in a "room". Using it you can: - Preview others' pages live - Sync a tab to a participant to automatically follow them - Chat on any web page

title: CasaOS
blurb: A simple, easy-to-use, elegant open-source home cloud system
description: CasaOS is an open-source home server system based on the Docker ecosystem and designed for home scenarios. It is committed to building the world's most simple, easy-to-use, and elegant home server system. CasaOS is compatible with Raspberry Pi and x86 devices.

title: RoadGoat
blurb: Find your perfect travel place
description: 🏘 Find the perfect cities and towns for your next trip. Our vibrant community ranks destinations and organizes them by interest (such as LGBT-friendly). 🗺 Map your travel history and sync travels from social media, wearables, Google Maps, and more.

title: Great Diwali Mail Exchange
blurb: Secret Santa but it’s for Diwali
description: From the makers of Ramayana Capital and Swadesh Capital, we bring you The Great Diwali Mail Exchange! Make Diwali even brighter this year by writing a heartfelt anonymous letter to a fellow desi in the US. For free!

title: BetterRecorder
blurb: Record screen, video and audio on Mac
description: BetterRecorder is a screen recorder for mac, it can record screen with desktop internal audio, webcam video and microphone audio. It is easy to use.

title: Offie
blurb: Find Airbnbs equipped for remote work
description: Offie is a free Chrome extension that lets you find Airbnbs with fast Wifi and comfortable workspaces. No more wasting time looking through listing photos and getting excited, only to realize the Wifi is slow!

title: Social Scroll for Twitter
blurb: Find anyone's old tweets with a couple of clicks
description: 😒 Tired of scrolling through twitter profiles to find old tweets? 👀 Or are you looking to find someone's first tweet? Well look no further, Social Scroll for Twitter is a smart tool which allows you to look up anyone's old tweets with a couple of clicks!

title: PAY.GAME
blurb: Pay-to-play on the Ethereum blockchain
description: Pay Game is the ultimate pay-to-play game on the Ethereum blockchain. Whatever you pay, that's your score. It's a re-imagination of my previous project highscore.money, but this time decentralized and verifiably fair.

title: Peek
blurb: A simple way to keep up with technology news
description: Peek surfaces technology news in the form of tweets. Sources include TechCrunch, The Verge, Engadget, The Guardian, Ars Technica, and more. Data is fetched via Twitter API. Tweet selection and ranking is automated.

title: YOMI
blurb: The best collection of free game tutorials on the web
description: Improve your game, with the best collection of game tutorials on the web from some of the most popular names in the industry.

title: Dockside (Open-Source)
blurb: Provision dev containers and staging environments with IDEs
description: Dockside is an open-source tool for provisioning lightweight access-controlled IDEs, staging environments and sandboxes - aka ‘devtainers’ - on local machines, on-premises (raw metal or VM) or in the cloud.

title: Requstory
blurb: Write user stories fast
description: Requstory helps you write your user story quickly. It has built-in features to help you easily draft and describe features of your project/product.

title: GoDog
blurb: Raise a well-behaved dog and build a stronger bond with it.
description: GoDog is an app with a set of lessons for dogs and their owners, created with the support of experienced dog trainers. A dog training and walking plan, a health diary, and a walking tracker in the app help you keep your pet well-behaved, healthy, and happy.
